result.execSummary:
The defendant Mehrdad Kajian was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Failure to Support Child (120 Days+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(2).
  • Failure to Support Child (120 Days+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(2).
  • Failure to Support Child (120 Days+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(2).
  • Failure to Support Child (120 Days+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Each ct concur. No objection to early termination of probation after 2 yrs if all monthly child support has been paid and all arrears owed are paid in full.
10/30/19 Crt orders that the order signed 9/10/19 discharging the def from probation on 9/17/19 is vacated. Crt also orders that based on the record made at the motion hearing on 2/6/19, the court discharges the def from probation to be applied retroactively so his discharge shall be effective as of 9/17/19.

miscConds.notes: $518  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.
Maintain full-time employment or part time if approved by agent or be seeking same.

Def not to leave Wisconsin without prior written approval of agent.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with PM and NM except as approved by family court orders. Def nto to make any transfers over $500 without prior written approval of agent.

Def to pay all extradition costs to be determined and filed by the State. Def to file tax returns on time each year and provide copy to agent within 1 wk of filling and all refunds to be applied toward child support owed. Def is to pay monthly child support as owed and ordered- currently at $3102 per mo. Def to pay all arrearages owed to child support as ordered by family court.   Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.
Court costs remitted. $92 VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.
Court costs remitted. $92 VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.
Court costs remitted. $92 VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.
